name: It Waits
description:
A text driven story about a person that finds a book that is not just a book. It is more a short story than game and should be able to be completed in about ten minutes.

This is my first released game to the public and I would love any type of feedback.

 This project was made to experiment and learn about sound, I wanted to immerse the reader more into the story through it. Fair warning the game is meant to be played with headphones and, yes, there are jump scares involved but I tried not to make it all about that. I wanted it to up the creep factor and hopefully I was able to through the story and sounds.
